name: Unchained
title: DeepSeek Shakes Markets, MOVE Token Surge, and More: Weekly Recap
text:
Synopsis
The crypto and AI markets experienced significant volatility, with DeepSeek's AI breakthrough causing market disruptions, while regulatory and strategic developments across crypto projects, exchanges, and financial institutions signal a complex and evolving landscape.

Key Insights
- DeepSeek AI's open-source model caused market turbulence, triggering a 3.5% NASDAQ drop and Bitcoin price decline to $99,950
- Czech National Bank Governor proposed allocating up to 5% of national reserves to Bitcoin, signaling potential institutional crypto adoption
- Trump-linked World Liberty Financial purchased $2 million in MOVE tokens, and Trump Media launched Truth.fe, a crypto-integrated financial services platform
- Binance faces expanded fraud investigation by French prosecutors covering 2019-2024 period
- KuCoin pleaded guilty to operating an unlicensed money transmitting business, agreeing to a $297 million settlement and exiting the US market
- Multiple crypto ETF applications submitted, including Solana and Dogecoin spot ETFs
- Venice AI's VVV token launched at a $1.6 billion valuation, immediately facing insider trading scrutiny
- A16Z-related crypto DAO rebranded to EliosOS following a request from the venture capital firm
- Former SEC Chair Gary Gensler transitions from crypto regulation to AI research at MIT
